crumbs.content: Get A List of Order Shipments

meta.title: Get A List of Order Shipments - Order Shipments - Orders v2 - Store Management - API Reference
meta.description:
Gets a list of all shipments on an order

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, ...

page.title: Get A List of Order Shipments

blocks.data: Gets a list of all shipments on an order

header.title: /orders/{order_id}/shipments
header.subtitle: Get A List of Order Shipments

blocks.data:
### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Orders | modify | `store_v2_orders` |
|  Orders | read-only | `store_v2_orders_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Client`|`client_id`|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Client: {client_id}
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Orders | modify | `store_v2_orders` |

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com

```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Client
* **Location**: header

order_id.description: ID of the order associated with this shipment.

order_address_id.description: ID of the associated order address.

shipping_method.description: Extra detail to describe the shipment, with values like: Standard, My Custom Shipping Method Name, etc. Can also be used for live quotes from some shipping providers.

shipping_provider.description: Enum of the BigCommerce shipping-carrier integration/module. (Note: This property should be included in a POST request to create a shipment object. If it is omitted from the request, the property’s value will default to custom, and no tracking link will be generated in the email. To avoid this behavior, you can pass the property as an empty string.)

tracking_carrier.title: Tracking Carrier
tracking_carrier.description: Optional, but if you include it, its value must refer/map to the same carrier service as the `shipping_provider` value.

comments.description: Comments the shipper wishes to add.

items.description: The items in the shipment. This object has the following members, all integer: order_product_id (required), quantity (required), product_id (read-only). A sample items value might be: [ {"order_product_id":16,"product_id": 0,"quantity":2} ]
